ygData.subject: Re: Tallon Zek Proposal
ygData.msgSnippet: yah 4 groups but still got internal splitting btw good and evil. NPC Good kill NPC EVil BUT PC group1[good] can kill PC group2[Good] get it?hehe Entreri Email:
ygData.messageBody:
yah 4 groups but still got internal splitting btw good and evil.
NPC Good kill NPC EVil
BUT PC group1[good] can kill PC group2[Good]


get it?hehe

From: Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy <sccheng@...>

Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Tallon Zek Proposal


>From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
>
>I think its 4 sides... like wat Leshrec says... btw whats everyone op on
>this? u guys gonna shift? I will still prefer to be Dark Elf if we shift...
>if not High Elves....
>
>Nicademous
>----- Original Message -----
>From: Leshrec <leshrec@...>
>To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>Sent: Tuesday, July 27, 1999 4:20 PM
>Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Tallon Zek Proposal
>
>
>> From: "Leshrec" <leshrec@...>
>>
>> 3 sides? Wasn't it 4 sides with dwarves, halfings and gnomes forming
>another
>> side? Not sure so please confirm..
>>
>>
>> -----Original Message-----
>> From: Entreri <drizzt@...>
>> To: sg-everquest@onelist.com <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>> Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 3:12 PM
>> Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Tallon Zek Proposal
>>
>>
>> >From: "Entreri" <drizzt@...>
>> >
>> >Ok let me expain how the racewar server works.
>> >Good Races:WoodElf,HighElf,Half-Elf,Halflings,Dwarf
>> >
>> >Neutral:Gnome,Humans,Erudites,Barbarians
>> >
>> >Evil:DarkElf,Troll,Orge
>> >
>> >NPC Guards of the Goody races will not KOS Goody and Neutral Races and
>will
>> >KOS Evil Races
>> >
>> >NPC Guards of the Evil Races will KOS all Goody races and
>Neutral-Goodclass
>> >races
>> >
>> >HOWEVER,different groups can PvP different groups players which means
let
>> >say a human walks into Kelethin,he would not be KOS by guards BUT could
>be
>> >killed by Elves..
>> >
>> >I think this should clear things up
>> >
>> >
>> >
>> >
>> >
>> >

>> >-----Original Message-----
>> >From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >To: 'sg-everquest@onelist.com' <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
>> >Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 9:51 AM
>> >Subject: RE: [sg-everquest] Tallon Zek Proposal
>> >
>> >
>> >>From: LKW <leekw13@...>
>> >>
>> >>I'm neutral to the shifting, I just follow the majority kakis's
>decision,
>> >>even thou my wiz is just half bubb to lvl 24 (shld have lvl if not
becoz
>> of
>> >>server down last night).
>> >>
>> >>Personally I think TZ server will be a very difficult server yet filled
>> >>with roleplay elements. Ever since we play EQ for so long, I bet by
now
>> >>most of us know what we wanna be, how to train what our char and
possess
>> >>with, at least, the basic survival knowledge. Compared to the time
when
>I
>> >>start EQ w/o been a beta player, I was wrong at that time when making
>> >>certain decisions, particularly how my char is created.
>> >>
>> >>Nevertheless, I will stick to Wiz even if we were to shift over to the
>new
>> >>server. Life is gonna be tough (esp the the begining stage, like wanna
>> die
>> >>cannot die, wanna live cannot live) but if it's a race war server, that
>> >>mean we better select to be under the same team. With the same team, I
>> bet
>> >>it will be much easier for us to hunt together.
>> >>
>> >>I'm for Erudite Wiz - with max INT pump in. Life will be harder than a
>HE
>> >>since ER dun have infravision (tried once in Prexus making a ER Wiz and
>> >>find it VERY difficult to play w/o light, kena whack up-down-left-right
>> >>shortly after I walked out of city).
>> >>
>> >>I leave the decision to the majority and my heart follow the majority.
>> Just
>> >>make sure this is the LAST migration, IF we have decided to shift.
>> >>
>> >>Btw, can someone enllighten me on the following:
>> >>In normal server, npc only KOS char of different alignment (eg DE kena
>KOS
>> >>in all elfs settlements, human kena KOS in Troll/Ogre territory, BUT
>human
>> >>wont be KOS in elf terrority). May I know if a char of good race walk
>> into
>> >>the city of ANOTHER TEAM which is ALSO a good race, will the char kena
>> KOS?
>> >> Eg HE and Human are considered good races yet under different team,
>will
>> a
>> >>human who walk into Felwithe kena KOS by HE npcs?
>> >>- If the answer is yes, then evil races will be a good choice, since
>based
>> >>on EQ'Lizer's article abt race war team comparison, evil races (DE,
>troll,
>> >>Ogre) have some of the best races for most of the classes. They also
>have
>> >>advantages since they have more access to the better lvling dungeons.
>> >>- If the answer is no (ie human char can go to elf shop buying supplies
>> w/o
>> >>been KOS), I will go for human, erudite and barbarian, they can lvl
>> >>fastest. Thou life is hard in the begining w/o light, but the reward
>will
>> >>pay off at the later stage. Erudite makes the most powerful casters at
>> >>high lvl, Barbarian make excellent tankers and human is the most
>flexible
>> >>amg all races, plus no xp penalty - see how someone in Inno lvl so damn
>> >>fast? hehe.
>> >>
>> >>Ziltus
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>
>> >>On Tuesday, 27 July, 1999 9:25 PM, Entreri [SMTP:drizzt@...]
>> >>wrote:
>> >>> Hi guys,
>> >>> I propose that we all move to Tallon Zek[PvP Teams].Okay here are my
>> >>SUGGESTIONS on why we MIGHT wanna move there.However if there isnt much
>> >>support,I will stay in Innoruuk with u guys.All critisims are welcomed!
>> >>>
>> >>> 1.Guild:Okay,lets face it,for normal servers,Guild aint of much fan
>> >>except of a tag there.I foresee that if a guild is set up in Tallon
>Zek,it
>> >>would be much more meaningfull in the sense that when everyone has a
>> common
>> >>goal and at the same time roleplaying WHAT it should be[huh?A paladin
>and
>> >>SK chatting with each other?].Serious roleplaying could be carried to
>the
>> >>fullest and the tension when going over zones which WILL encourage
>> grouping
>> >>>
>> >>> 2.New Server.Since its new,it would be nice that there will be
players
>> >>around to group.
>> >>>
>> >>> 3.MAIN POINT:The tension!This time,you would be much more carefull
>going
>> >>through zones and when buddies come the fullest and where racism too
>> >>:).Although all the Singaporean EQ Players would be best if same
>> >>group,however we could have some not in this group so they could set up
>> >>their own guild and wage war with us which WILL defintely improve the
SG
>> EQ
>> >>community.If we could not be friends,we could be still foes :)
>> >>>
>> >>> 4.ok..high level players..ahem Garren...There seems to be a quest to
>> >>switch servers though I do not encourage this coz it would be more fun
>if
>> >>everyone same level.
>> >>>
>> >>> 5.SG Mauling:heh..Imagine all 35SG players on this list play same
>group
>> >>and have a FULLSCALE invasion on Freeport?hehe...imagine the fun..
>> >>>
>> >>> 6.The spirit bond BTW on SG players will defintely tighten with
>this..:)
>> >>>
>> >>> 7.Makes higher lv SGs get good items for their lower SG counterparts
>so
>> >>our SG strength could be increased.[Note:Coz 300levels4s could maul a
>> >>level50?]
>> >>>
>> >>> 8.We could have serious planning on what class to use so we would not
>be
>> >>as messy as now...
>> >>>
>> >>> 9.We had PROBABLY wrongly configured our chr in the past so it would
>be
>> a
>> >>nice change
>> >>>
>> >>> 10.SGs players are now split into 2..mainly the highlevels and low
>> >>levels..It would be nice if this everyone would be same level again
>> >>>
>> >>> Thx for reading...just my 2cents
>> >>>
>> >>>
